summary: Over the summer, a series of unfortunate happening triggers a financial crisis for a young woman and she soon finds her life falling apart.
cast: Michelle Williams|Lucy|David Koppell|Max Clement|Sid Shanley|Dave Hubner|Michelle Worthey|Will Oldham|Wally Dalton|Roger D. Faires|Boggs Johnson|Tanya Smith|Michael Brophy|John Robinson|John Breen|Deneb Catalan|Skeeter Greene|Marilyn Faith Hickey|Jeanine Jackson|Brenna Beardsley|Winfield Jackson|Gabe Nevins|Connor O'Shea|Josh Larson|Ayanna Berkshire|Dan Wilson|Greg Schmitt|Will Patton|David Rives Curtright|Larry Fessenden|Holly Cundiff|James Yu|George Haapala|Deirdre O'Connell|M. title: Wendy and Lucy
